loans.name: Fuente De Vida Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socios emprendedores uno de ellos es Norlan joven 19 años de edad, soltero, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva desde hace 2 años, sus productos los comercializa al lado del norte del país.  Tiene una trabajadora que le ayuda a vender. El crédito lo solicita para comprar mercadería como pantalones de varon ,pantalones de damas, camisas de varon, chores, ropa interior como tanga, brasieres, talladores, calcetines, biquinis, etc. Marlon hombre de 28 años de edad, su negocio es la elaboración de muebles y Hayda mujer 28 años de edad y su negocio es una pulpería.
texts.en: The group is formed of three entrepreneurial members, one of whom is Norlan, a young man of 19, single. For two years, his business has been selling new clothes. He sells his products on the north side of the country. He has an employee who helps him sell. He is requesting the loan to purchase merchandise such as men's pants, women's pants, shorts, and underwear such as thongs, bras, socks, bikinis, etc. Marlon is a 28-year-old man. His business is building furniture. Hayda is a 28-year-old woman, and her business is a grocery store.

loans.use: purchase men's pants, women's pants, shorts, and underwear such as thongs, bras, socks, bikinis, etc.

loans.name: El Malinche Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Aura mujer de 47 años de edad, acompañada,  su negocio de venta de nacatamales, venta de sopa y destace de cerdo desde hace 7 años. Dos hijas mayores de edad e independiente le ayudan en la elaboración de los nacatamales, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 6 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de materia prima como hojas de chagüites, maíz, papa, arroz, tomate, chiltoma, cebolla, achiote, etc. Ana mujer de 44 años, su negocio es la venta de pollo y gaseosa y Maricel mujer de 39 años y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de Avon.
texts.en: This group is formed of three entrepreneurial members, one of whom is Aura, a 47-year-old woman, married. For seven years, her business has been selling nacatamales (corn, meat, and rice, wrapped in banana leaves), soup, and pork. Two older, grown daughters help her make the nacatamales. She has been a client of this institution for six years. She is requesting the loan to purchase basic ingredients such as banana leaves, corn, potatoes, rice, tomatoes, peppers, onions, achiote spice, etc. Ana is a 44-year-old woman; her business is selling chicken and sodas. Maricel is a 39-year-old woman, and her business is selling Avon cosmetics.

loans.use: purchase basic ingredients such as pork, rice, banana leaves, achiote spice, tomatoes, peppers, onions, corn, potatoes, etc.

loans.name: Vista Bonita Group

texts.es: Grupo  formado por tres socios  varones micro empresarios de éxitos uno de ellos es Roberto hombre de 68años de edad, casado, con un hijo de 20 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de frijoles cocidos, venta de leña, plantas ornamentales actividad que inicio desde hace 3 años. su esposa le ayuda a atender el negocio . El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de maceteras, quintal de frijoles, fletes de leñas etc. Pedro Joaquín es otro socio su edad es 67 años su negocio es el destace de cerdo y venta de nacatamales y Jairo tiene 27 años y su negocio es el alquiler de videos juegos.
texts.en: This group is comprised of three small entrepreneurs whose businesses are quite successful. One of them, Roberto, 68 years old, is married and has a twenty-year-old son. He sells cooked broad beans, firewood, and ornamental plants. He started this business three years ago and has been running it with the help of his wife ever since. He will use the loan to buy plant pots, a quintal of broad beans, bundles of firewood, etc. The two other members of the group are Pedro Joaquín, 67 years old, who is a pig butcher and also sells natacamales (a Nicaraguan dish similar to the tamale), and Jairo, 27 years old, who runs a video game rental service.

loans.use: to buy plant pots, a quintal of broad beans, bundles of firewood, etc.

loans.name: Casa De Oro Group

texts.es: El grupo está conformado por tres socias empresarias una de ellas es Carolina mujer de  24 años de edad, casada, con un hijo menor de 11 meses. Su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y buñuelos en su comunidad desde hace 3 años. Su hermana le ayuda a vender. El crédito lo solicita para comprar mercadería como pantalones de varones,pantalon de damas, camisas de varon, camisetas de varon, blusas de damas, perfumes de dama,perfumes de varon, maquillaje. Auxiliadora joven de 21 años de edad  su negocio es la elaboración y venta de canastos y Samara mujer de 33 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de comida y ropa íntima.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of three entrepreneurs, one of whom is Carolina, 24, who is married and has an 11-month-old son.  She sells new clothing and doughnuts in her community and has been in business for three years.  Her sister helps with sales.  The loan she is requesting is to buy merchandise such as men's and women's pants, men's shirts and t-shirts, women's blouses, perfumes and cosmetics.

Auxiliadora, 21, has a business making and selling baskets, and Samara, 33, sells food and lingerie.

loans.use: To buy clothing such as men's and women's pants, men's shirts and t-shirts, women's blouses, perfumes, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Berlin Group

texts.es: Grupo formado cinco socios emprendedores de éxitos una de ellas es Sonia mujer de 47 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos de 22 y 13 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de cosechas de temporada, actividad que viene realizando desde hace 10 años. sus dos hijos le ayudan en el negocio de cortar las frutas de temporada . El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cosechas como de mamon, tamarindo, jocotes, aguacate etc. sus metas y sueños es poner zin nuevo a su casa con las ganancias que estas le generen, Julio tiene 27 años de edad su negocio es la venta de compra y queso, Emma tiene 50 años su negocio es la ventas de tamales, pinolillo, pinol, José Luis tiene 37 años de edad su negocio es la venta de tamales y Rosmery tiene  21 años de edad su negocio es la venta de ropa interior.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of five successful entrepreneurs, one of whom is Sonia, 47.  She lives with her common-law husband and two children, ages 22 and 13.  For ten years she has been in the business of selling seasonal fruit and her two children help when it comes to harvesting the fruit.

She plans to use the loan to buy fruit such as papayas, tamarinds, plums, avocados, etc.  Her goal is to put metal sheeting on her house with the profits she earns.  

Julio, 27, buys and sells cheese; Emma, 50, sells tamales, pinolillo and pinol (corn flour dinks); José Luis, 37, sells tamales and Rosmery, 21, sells underwear.

loans.use: To buy tamarinds, plums, avocados, etc.

loans.name: Cristo Vive Group

texts.es: Este grupo está conformado por tres socias exitosas una de ellas es Johana mujer de 48 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos menores de 12 y 8 años. Su negocio es la venta de frijoles cocidos, tortillas y una pulpería desde 2 años.  Vende sus productos en su casa. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 1 año. El crédito lo solicita para la compra por quintal de maíz, fletes de leñas, cal, frijoles crudos. Juana  de 29 años  su negocio es la elaboración y venta de artesanía de barro y Josefa joven de 23 años y su negocio es la elaboración y venta de artesanía de barro ya que anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de comidas y arroz de leches cambio de actividad comercial.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of three successful entrepreneurs, one of whom is Johana, 48, who is married and has two children, ages 12 and 8.  She has a business selling cooked beans and tortillas and also runs a grocery store at home.  She has been in business for two years and a member of the institution for one year.  The loan she is requesting is to buy bulk corn, firewood, lime, and raw beans.

Juana, 29, makes and sells clay crafts and Josefa, 23, makes and sells clay crafts but used to sell food and rice pudding.

loans.use: To buy bulk corn, firewood, lime, and raw beans.

loans.name: Braulio Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socios empresarios de éxitos una ellas es Norma mujer de 40 años de edad, casada con un hijo menor de 15 años. Su negocio es la venta de cosechas de tamarindo, mamon, aguacate y mango  desde hace 6 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 5 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de cosecha de mamon, aguacate y  mango. Álvaro hombre de 37 años de edad su negocio es la venta de delantales y Martha mujer de 31 años y su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three members who are successful entrepreneurs. One of them is Norma, 40, who is married and has a 15-year-old son. Norma has been selling tamarind, mamón [a fruit from the soapberry family], avocado and mango for six years.

She has been a client of the institution for five years and is now requesting a loan to buy mamón, avocado and mango. The other members are Álvaro, 37, who sells aprons and Martha, 31, who sells fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy tamarind, avocado, mamón and mango to sell.

loans.name: Santa Fe Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socios emprendedores uno de ellas es Ana mujer de 34 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos menores de 15 y 9 años. Su negocio es la venta de nacatamales, tortillas una pulpería desde hace 8 años, comercializa sus productos en su casa. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 3 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de materia prima como hojas de chagüites, leña, maíz, papa, arroz, achote. Y compras para la pulpería como quintal de frijoles crudos, azúcar, jabón, chiverías, gaseosa, etc. Evelin tiene 35 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de leche y José  hombre de 41  y su negocio es la venta de frutas.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of three entrepreneurs, one of whom is Ana, 34, who lives with her common-law husband and two children, ages 15 and 9.  She has a business selling nacatamales and tortillas.  For eight years she has been running a grocery store out of her home.  She has been a member of the institution for three years.  The loan she is requesting is to buy goods such as banana leaves, firewood, corn, potatoes, rice and annato.  She will also buy grocery products in bulk such as raw beans, sugar, soap, chives, sodas, etc.

Evelin, 35, sells milk for a living and José, 41, sells fruit.

loans.use: To buy goods such as banana leaves, firewood corn, potatos, rice, annato and grocery products such as raw beans, sugar, soap, chives, sodas, etc.

loans.name: Diriangen Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias una de ellas es Rosa mujer de 46 años de edad, casada, con un hijo menor  a su cargo de 10 años. Su negocio es un restaurante desde hace 10 años en un centro turistico . Su esposo le ayuda a administrarlo. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 5 años. El crédito lo solicita para mejorar la estructura del local en la compra de materiales de construccion como piedra cantera,bloques, hierro 3/8, cemento canal, piedrin arena etc. María mujer de 42 años de edad, su negocio es el destace de cerdo y Alba mujer 46 años y su negocio es la elaboración y venta de artesanías.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three entrepreneurial members. Rosa is 46 years old, married, and has a ten-year-old child in her care. For the last 10 years, she has had a restaurant at a tourism center in her community. Her husband helps to manage the business. She has been a member of the institution for five years.  The loan will be used to renovate the restaurant, buying construction materials such as stone, bricks, iron, cement, gravel, sand, etc.

Maria is 42 years old; she has a pork butchering business. Alba is 46 years old and makes and sells crafts.

loans.use: The loan will be used to renovate the restaurant, buying construction materials such as stone, bricks, iron, cement, gravel, sand, etc.

loans.name: Jesus Salva Group

texts.es: Este grupo está conformado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Adilia mujer de 62 años de edad, soltera, su negocio es  hace y vende  repostería desde hace 50 años, sus productos los comercializa en su comunidad. El crédito lo solicita para invertir en la compra de materia prima como harina, huevo, queso, azúcar, aceite, mantequilla, manteca royal, levadura, etc. Betty joven de 22 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de puros y María joven de 24 años y su negocio es la venta de puros.
texts.en:
This group comprises three enterprising members, one of whom is Adilia. She is 62 years old and single. She runs a business making and selling pastries. She has been working in this business for the past 50 years, selling her products in her local community. She will invest the requested loan in the purchase of ingredients, such as flour, eggs, cheese, sugar, cooking oil, butter, shortening, yeast, etc. 

Betty is a young woman, 22 years old. Her business is the sale of cigars. And María, a young woman, 24 years old, also sells cigars.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients, such as flour, eggs, cheese, sugar, cooking oil, butter, shortening, yeast, etc.

loans.name: Buen Progreso Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Blanca mujer de 38 años de edad, soltera, con tres hijos menores de edad de 15, 13 y 11 años. Su negocio es la compra y venta de cosechas de frutas de temporada  desde hace 5 años, sus productos los comercializa en el mercado. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 3 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de cosecha de tamarindo. Mirian mujer de 53 años, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de Avon y Olga mujer de 60 años y su negocio es el destace de cerdo.
texts.en:
The group is made up of three entrepreneurial women. One of them is Blanca, who is 38 years old and a single mother with three children aged 15, 13 and 11. For the last 5 years she has had a business buying and selling seasonal fruits. She sells the fruit at the market and has been a customer of the institution for 3 years.

Blanca is asking for the loan to buy tamarind harvest. 

Miriam is 53 years old and sells Avon cosmetics and Olga who is 60 years old has a business butchering pigs.

loans.use: to buy tamarind harvests.

loans.name: Delfin Azul Group

texts.es: Este grupo está conformado por cuatros socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Dravis mujer de 48 años de edad, casada, con un hijo de 22 años. Su negocio es la venta de pescados y nacatamales desde hace 25 años. Su hija le ayuda a vender Sus productos  en el mercado. El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar pescados mareños. Adilia mujer de 31 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de  ropa nueva, Heydi mujer de 31 años, su negocio es la venta de tortillas y María mujer de 62 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de tortillas y gaseosas.
texts.en:
This group is made up of four entrepreneurial women. One of them is Dravis who is 48 years old and married with a 22-year-old son. For the last 25 years she has had a business selling fish and nacatamales [corn, meat and rice wrapped in a banana leaf]. Her daughter helps her to sell her products at the market.

Dravis is asking for the loan to buy sea fish. 

Adilia is 31 years old and has a business selling new clothing. Heydi is 31 and has a business selling tortillas and María who is 62 years old has a business selling tortillas and fizzy drinks.

loans.use: to buy sea fish.

loans.name: Amor Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro socios emprendedores una de ellas es Dominga mujer 42 años de edad, soltera, con un hijo menor de 9 años. Su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 12 años. Comercializa sus frutas en el mercado. Tiene 5 años de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de limón, naranja agria, mandarina,chayote, ayote, zanahoria, tomate, cebolla, chiltoma, melon, sandias,  etc. Tania joven de 23 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de comida y tortillas, Adela joven  de 22 años, su negocio es la venta de ropa y Wilber hombre de 30 años y su negocio es  la crianza y venta de pollo.
texts.en:
This group is made up of four entrepreneurs. One of them is Dominga who is 42 years old and single with a 9-year-old son. She has run a business for the last 12 years selling fruit and vegetables. She sells her fruit at the market and has been a customer of the institution for 5 years. 

Dominga is asking for the loan to buy lemons, bitter oranges, mandarins, chayote squash, ayote [type of squash], carrots, tomatoes, onions, sweet peppers, melons, watermelons etc.

Tania is 23 years old and has a business selling food and tortillas. Adela is 22 years old and her business is selling clothing and 30-year-old Wilber's business is rearing and selling chickens.

loans.use: to buy fresh fruit and vegetables such as lemons, bitter oranges, mandarins, chayote squash, ayote [type of squash], carrots, tomatoes, onions, sweet peppers, melons, watermelons etc.

loans.name: Los Chilamates Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es María mujer de 39 años de edad, acompañada, con un hijo menor de 12 años. Su negocio es una pulpería que tiene en su casa desde hace 3 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 11 años. El crédito lo solicita para comprar por quintal granos básicos como arroz, frijoles crudos, azúcar, bidones de aceite, cajas de jabón, cigarros, chiverías, etc. Patricia mujer de 51 años, su negocio es la venta de repostería y ropa usada ambulante y Olga mujer de 51 años y su negocio es la venta de repostería.
texts.en:
The group is made up of three entrepreneurial women. One of them is María who is 39 years old  and has a partner and a 12-year-old son. For the last 3 years she has run a small grocery store in her house. She has been a customer of the institution for 11 years. 

María is asking for the loan to buy supplies by the quintal such as rice, beans and sugar, drums of oil, boxes of soap, cigarettes, dairy products etc. 

Patricia is 51 years old and has a business as a street trader selling pastries and second hand clothing while 51-year-old Olga has a business selling pastries.

loans.use: to buy bulk grains such as rice and beans, sugar, drums of oil, boxes of soap, cigarettes, dairy products etc.

loans.name: Flora Argentina

texts.es: Flora es una mujer emprendedora de 48 años de edad,  acompañada, con cuatros hijos a su cargo de 18, 17 y dos gemelos de 16 años. Su negocio anteriormente vendia comida, en la actualidad su negocio  es la venta de frutas y huevos  desde hace varios meses, sus frutas los comercializan en su comunidad y los huevos por  encargo. Una hija y una nuera le ayudan a vender. Tiene 5 años de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de 30 cajillas de huevos para comercializarlos ya que a la venta del huevo obtiene un mayor porcentaje de ganancias
texts.en:
Flora is a 48-year-old entrepreneur who has a partner and has 4 children aged 18, 17 and 16-year-old twins under her care. Previously she had a business selling food but for the last few months she has been selling fruit and eggs. She sells the fruit in her local community and sells the eggs to order. Her daughter and daughter-in-law help her to sell. She has been a customer of the institution for 5 years.

She will use the loan to buy 30 cases of eggs to sell, since selling eggs gives her a better profit margin.

loans.use: to buy 30 cases of eggs to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients such as pork, banana leaves, rice, potatoes, achiote [annatto], corn, twine, salt, tomatoes, onions etc.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Luis es un hombre emprendedor de 27 años de edad, casado, con dos hijos menores a su cargo de 5 y 6 años. Su negocio es una pulpería que está ubicada en su casa desde hace 10 años. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de inventario para la pulpería como quintal de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, bidón de aceite, cajas de jabón, y comprar cosméticos tales como pinturas de labios,  pinturas de uñas y maquillaje.
texts.en:
Luis, 27, is an enterprising man.  He's married and has two young children in his care, ages 5 and 6.  His business is a small grocery store that he has had in his house for 10 years.

He'll invest the loan in buying inventory for his store: quintals of rice, beans, sugar, cans of oil, boxes of soap and cosmetics such as lipstick, nail polish, and make-up.

loans.use: to buy staples and cosmetics

loans.name: Lucrecia  Del Carmen

texts.es: Lucrecia es una mujer esforzada y emprendedora de 40 años de edad, acompañada, con un hijo menor de 15 años. Su negocio es una pulpería  desde hace 10 años. El crédito lo requiere para surtir  su pulpería y comprar arroz, frijoles crudos, azúcar, aceite, jabón, pampers, chiverías, gaseosas, etc. y compra de materia prima para fritanga como carne de res, de cerdo, de pollo, plátanos maduros, verdes, repollo, etc.
texts.en: Lucrecia is a 40 year old, energetic entrepreneur.  She is a common-law wife with a young 15 year old son.  Her business, which she has had for ten years, is a general store.  The loan she is requesting is to stock her general store and purchase rice, raw beans, sugar, oil, soap, “pampers”, snacks, soda, etc. as well as food for frying such as beef, pork, chicken, ripe plantains, greens, cabbage, and other items..

loans.use: to purchase staple goods such as rice, raw beans, sugar, oil, soap, "pampers', snacks, soda, etc.

loans.name: Dania Gabriela

texts.es: Dania es una mujer emprendedora  de 27 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos menores de 2 y 6 años. Su negocio es la venta de zapatos nacionales en un tramo que tiene ubicado en el mercado desde hace 5 años. Tiene a una persona particular que le ayuda a vender los zapatos. El crédito lo invertirá en comprar nueva línea zapatos cerrados.
texts.en:
Dania, 27, is an enterprising woman.  She's married and has two young children, ages 2 and 6.

Her business is selling shoes made in Nicaragua in a place located in the market.  She has a person who helps her sell the shoes.

She'll invest the loan in buying a new line of closed shoes for men, women, and children.

loans.use: to buy shoes

loans.name: Domingo

texts.es: Domingo es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor de 48 años de edad, casado, su negocio es la compra y venta de llantas desde hace 20 años, tiene tres trabajadores un hijo y dos particulares.  Tiene 10 años de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo solicita para comprar más inventario de llantas.
texts.en:
Domingo's a hardworking and enterprising man.  He's 48 years old and married.

Domingo has worked buying and selling tires for 20 years.  He has three workers--a son and two private individuals.  He has been a client of the institution for 10 years.

He's requesting the loan to buy more tire inventory.

loans.use: to buy tires

loans.name: En Nombre De Dios Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socios uno de ellos es Ana mujer de 33 años de edad, soltera, con un hijo menor de 3 años. Su negocio es la venta de cosmético de Avon desde hace 6 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 3 años y el crédito lo solicita  para comprar cosméticos al contado como perfumes de damas, caballeros, maquillajes, cremas faciales, pinturas de uñas, pinturas de labios, cremas para cuerpos, etc. Fátima mujer de 27 años de edad su negocio es  la venta de ropa íntima y  Bismar hombre de 43 años de edad su   negocio es la venta de ropa usada.
texts.en: This group has three members.  One is 33-year-old Ana.  She is single and has a three-year-old son.  Ana has been selling Avon products for six years.  She has been with the communal bank for three years and is applying for this loan to buy cosmetics, such as perfumes for men and women, make-up, facial creams, nail varnish, lipsticks, body creams, and more, on credit.  Fátima, 27 years old, has a business selling underwear.  Bismar is 43 years old and sells second-hand clothes.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, such as perfumes for men and women, make-up, facial creams, nail varnish, lipsticks, body creams, and more, on credit.

loans.name: Kiutys Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socios emprendedores uno de ellos es Alejandro un joven de 23 años de edad, soltero. Su negocio es la venta de cosméticos y ropa desde hace 4 años en su comunidad, tiene 3 personas particulares que le ayudan a vender. El crédito lo solicita para invertir en comprar mercadería de ropa como pantalones, camisas, camisetas, blusas, faldas. Marianela joven de 23 años, su negocio es la venta de variedades como zapatos, ropa y Arledys mujer de 24 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa y sandalia.
texts.en:
This group has 3 entrepreneurial members. One of the members is Alejandro, a single 23-year-old. He makes a living by selling cosmetics and clothing, and has done so for the past 4 years in his community. There are 3 people who help him to sell.

The loan that he has requested will be invested in the purchase of clothing merchandise like pants, tops, t-shirts, blouses, and skirts.

Marianela is 23 years old and makes a living by selling things like shoes and clothing. Arledys, who is 24 years old, makes a living by selling clothing and sandals.

loans.use: to buy clothing merchandise like pants, tops, t-shirts, blouses, and skirts.

loans.name: Torre Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socios uno de ellos  Martha mujer de 48 años de edad, casada, su negocio es la venta de  fritanga  en su comunidad desde  hace 10 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 4 años. El crédito lo solicita para comprar leña, carbón, plátano, repollo, queso, tortillas, aceite, arroz, etc. María mujer de 55 años de edad y su negocio es la elaboración y venta de dulcería y  Cándido hombre de 56 años y su negocio es la venta de golosinas.
texts.en:
This group has three members. One of them is Martha who is 48 years old, married, and runs a small restaurant in her neighborhood since 10 years back. She has been a client of this communal bank for four years. She is requesting this loan in order to buy firewood, coal, plantains, cabbage, cheese, tortillas, oil, rice, and more. 

Maria is a 55-year-old woman who makes and sells sweets, and Cándido is a 56-year-old man who sells candy.

loans.use: to buy firewood, coal, plantains, cabbage, cheese, tortillas, oil, rice, etc

loans.name: Mujer Bonita Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por cuatro socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Juana mujer de 55 años de edad, casada, con un hijo de 23 años, su negocio es la elaboración y venta de artesanía de madera y jícaro desde hace 25 años, sus productos los comercializa ambulante y por encargo en el mercado oriental de Managua y los pueblos blancos. Su hermana y un sobrino le ayudan a pintar las artesanías. El crédito lo solicita para invertir en materiales como colores, madera, goma, laca, jícaro, manila. Maricela mujer de 30 años de edad se dedica al negocio de la elaboración y venta de pan, Josefa mujer de 35 años de edad, su negocio es un salón de belleza y Marta mujer de 44 años de edad y su negocio es la elaboración y venta de artesanía de calzado.
texts.en: This group is comprised of four enterprising women. One of them is Juana, who is married and has a 23-year-old son. For the last 25 years she has had a business making and selling crafts made from wood and from jícaro gourds. She sells her crafts in street markets and sells her goods by order in the eastern market of Managua and in Los Pueblos Blancos. Her sister and her niece help her to paint her crafts. She is seeking a loan in order to purchase materials such as paints, wood, rubber, lacquer, yarn and jícaro gourds. The other members of the group are: Maricela, 30, who makes and sells bread Josefa, 35, who has a beauty salon Marta, 44, who makes and sells footwear

loans.use: to purchase materials such as paints, wood, rubber, lacquer, yarn and jícaro gourds.

loans.name: Los Sanchez Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Mariana mujer de 41  años de edad, acompañada, con tres hijos de 19, 15 y 10 años, su negocio es la venta de tortillas y elotes cocidos  desde hace 10 años. Tiene dos muchachas particulares que le ayudan en la elaboración de las tortillas. Sus productos los comercializa en su comunidad. El crédito lo solicita para invertir en comprar láminas de zinc, fletes de leña, sacos de elote y quintal de maíz. Margarita mujer de 29 años de edad y su negocio es una pulpería y Elizabeth mujer 20 años de edad y  su negocio es la venta de nacatamales.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three enterprising members.  One of them is Mariana, 41.  She's married and has three children, ages 19, 15, and 10.

Mariana's business for the last 10 years has been selling tortillas and cooked corn.  She has two young women who help her make the tortillas.  She sells her products in her community.

She's requesting the loan to invest in buying metal sheets, a load of firewood, bags of corn on the cob, and a quintal of corn.

Margarita, 29, has a grocery store.  Elizabeth, 20, sells nacatamales [Nicaraguan-style tamales].

loans.use: to buy metal sheets, firewood, and corn

loans.name: Mujeres Hermosas Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Gloria mujer de 33 años de edad, soltera, con dos hijos menores de 10 y 8 años, su negocio es la venta de fritanga desde hace 5 años en su comunidad, su hermana le ayuda a preparar las diferentes variedades que vende. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 1 año. El crédito lo requiere para comprar materia prima como arroz, aceite, frijoles, plátanos, carne de res, carne de pollo, carne de cerdo, sal, verduras, queso, plátanos maduros, etc. Ivette mujer de 29 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de ropa y cosméticos y María mujer de 48 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de calzado.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three members who are small businesswomen.  One of them is Gloria who is 33 years old, is single and has two young children who are 10 and 8 years old.  For five years her business has been the sale of fast food in her community.  Her sister helps her to prepare the different varieties that she sells.  She has been a client of the institution for one year.  She needs the loan to purchase raw materials like rice, oil, beans, bananas, beef, chicken, pork, salt, vegetables, cheese, plantains, etc.  

Ivette is a 29-year-old woman who has a business selling clothing and cosmetics.  María is a 48-year-old woman who has a business selling shoes.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials like rice, oil, beans, bananas, beef, pork, chicken, salt, vegetables, cheese, plantains, etc.

loans.name: Abdul

texts.en: This is 47-year-old Abdul. He is married and has four children aged 22, 18, 15, and 12. In 2001, Abdul established his drinks business to generate funds to support his children's education. His business is located in the outskirts of town and his main customers are local men and women. Working seven days a week and 14 hours a day, he earns about 1,000,000 Sierra Leonean leones (SLL) every month from this business. Abdul has already received and successfully repaid four loans, and now requires a new loan of 5,000,000 SLL in order to buy stocks of stout (1,500,000 SLL), star beer (1,000,000 SLL) and soft drink (500,000 SLL). He hopes that this loan will increase his stock level and hence his income. In the future, Abdul plans to become a distributor for a brewery, to educate his children and to develop his second plot of land. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy drinks for his business.

loans.name: Salamatu

texts.en:
This is 36-year-old Salamatu. She is widowed and has three children aged four, nine and fourteen. She also has one additional child living with her in order to assist a younger sister in her schooling. In 1998, Salamatu established her business selling cooking utensil and cups after dropping out of school, to help her husband pay their household expenses. Her business is located in the city center and her main customers are local adults. Working seven days a week and 14 hours a day, she earns about 1,106,550 Sierra Leonean leones (SLL) every month from this business. 

Salamatu would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL in order to pay for additional plates, dishes and sauce pots. She hopes that this loan will improve her stock and raise profits. In the future, Salamatu plans to expand the business to the outskirts of town and hopes to be able to make more profit. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of plates, dishes and sauce pots

loans.name: Alfreda

texts.en: Alfreda is 31 years old and lives in West Point, one of the most populated and well known market towns in Montserrado county, Liberia. She is a high school graduate and she has said she is good at managing her home affairs and business. She is married with two children aged 11 and 12 who are attending school and live at home. For the past six years she has been selling used clothes in the local market. The problem she faces is that sometimes business is slow, but most of the time she makes a profit and she uses it to sustain her family. She is requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business and she hopes to build a house in the near future.

loans.use: to buy more used clothes for her business

loans.name: Antoney

texts.en:
Antoney lives and works outside of Kakamega town, in Kakamega county. Kakamega county is located in Western Kenya, close to the Ugandan border. It contains the only tropical rain forest in Kenya, and the variety of the flora in the region makes it well-suited for beekeeping. It has one of the highest rural population densities in the world (in some areas, close to 600 people per square kilometer), which may contribute to the region's high poverty rates.

Antoney is married, and has five children. His wife works as a teacher, while he is engaged in projects on their land. He is currently growing beans, maize and bananas as well as tending to a tree plantation. He is excited to start beekeeping because his land is suitable for bees and he wants to generate more income from his farm. 

This is Antoney’s first loan, and he plans to use the income generate by his beehives to “buy more hives and initiate more farming projects like raising poultry and rare pigs.”

loans.use: to buy beehives for honey production.

loans.name: Ma Erlinda

texts.es: Ma Erlinda, tiene 46 años de edad, esta soltera, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de Petoa, Santa Bárbara junto a sus hijos y un nieto. Hace 2 años inicio con  el negocio de  pulpería donde vende productos alimenticios como ser carnes, refrescos, churros,  harina, pan etc., también tiene la venta de mercadería en general como ser ropa para mujer y zapatos. El préstamo que ha solicitado es el segundo ciclo en ODEF y es por 10,000 Lempiras. El cual lo va invertir en  la compra de productos alimenticios como harina, granos básicos, churros, refrescos, y mercadería como ropa, carteras y sandalias. Su meta es construir un local más amplio para su negocio y que su hijo pueda terminar sus estudios.
texts.en: Ma Erlinda is 46 years old and single. She has two children and lives in the municipality of Petoa, Santa Bárbara with her children and her grandson. Two years ago she opened her own grocery store where she sells food products, such as meat, soft drinks, churros, flour, and bread. She also sells general merchandise, such as women’s clothing and shoes. The loan she has requested is her second loan cycle with ODEF and it is for 10,000 HNL. She will invest it in purchasing food products, such as flour, staple grains, churros, and soft drinks, and merchandise, such as clothing, wallets, and sandals. Her goal is to build a wider space for her business and to see her son finish his studies.

loans.use: to purchase and sell food products, such as flour, staple grains, churros, and soft drinks, and merchandise, such as clothing, wallets, and sandals

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en: Elvira is an enthusiastic farmer and a pioneer in innovative technologies that benefit the environment. She is investing in her 10 cubic meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester because it will allow her to take advantage of 100% of the waste produced by her animals. She will use what to the uninitiated is "waste" to generate renewable biogas and biofertilizer. This loan represents 46% of the total cost of her Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.use: To purchase a 10 cubic meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester

loans.name: Denis De Los Angeles

texts.es: Denis, es un señor emprendedor que habita junto a su esposa, ella no trabaja es ama de casa. Denis se mantiene económicamente gracias a sus servicios de elaboración e instalación de persianas, un trabajo un poco peligroso ya que tiene que estar manipulando vidrio y aluminio de los cuales son hechas las persianas. Solicita el apoyo de crédito, para comprar materia prima los cuales no tiene en existencia para continuar su negocio, lo que le permite obtener el pan de cada día para él y su esposa.
texts.en: Denis is an enterprising man who lives with his wife. She does not work; she is a housewife. Denis supports himself and his wife economically thanks to his services making and installing blinds. This is quite a dangerous job since he has to handle glass and aluminium, which the blinds are made of. He is requesting the loan in order to buy raw materials he does not have in order to continue his business so he can earn a living for himself and his wife.

loans.use: to purchase aluminium and glass

loans.name: Ciriaco

texts.en: Ciriaco is a young farmer interested in using new technology on his farm to reduce operating costs and to improve yields. With his 10 cubic meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester, he will be able to do both. The digester will turn the abundant cow manure on his farm into renewable biogas, allowing him to replace expensive LP gas use. Furthermore, the system will produce a potent biofertilizer, allowing him to maintain or improve yields without having to depend on expensive and damaging agrochemical fertilizers. This loan represents 46% of the total cost of his Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.use: To purchase a biodigester for making fertilizer and biogas

loans.name: Isidoro Benito

texts.en: Isidoro Benito, the patriarch of a family dedicated to farming, oversees the small-scale production of meat, milk, and eggs. In order to obtain more value from the milk, he produces cheese which his family then sells at their small restaurant. In general, energy use on his site is expensive, often several hundred pesos per month. Through the acquisition of his 20 cubic meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester, he will be able to dramatically reduce his family's energy costs by shifting from liquefied petroleum gas to renewable biogas generated from cow waste. This loan represents 48% of the total cost of his Sistema Biobolsa biodigester.

loans.use: To purchase a 20 cubic meter Sistema Biobolsa biodigester

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy de 28 años de edad, está casada con Walter y tiene 2 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. Nancy se dedica a la agricultura, porque desde muy niña siempre estuvo apoyando a sus padres quienes se dedicaban a la agricultura orientada a la producción de cacao orgánico y barbasco. Fue así que aprendió todo lo necesario para aprender a realizar dicha actividad con todas las condiciones necesarias para hacerla muy beneficiosa económicamente. Cuando cumplió 20 años sus padres le heredaron 4 cuadras de plantaciones con cacao y junto a su pareja empezaron a trabajar por el bienestar de su familia. Su trabajo en el campo es un trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias ya que junto a su pareja y otros trabajadores que contrata trata de brindarle un mantenimiento constante a los árboles de cacao para llegar al final de la campaña productiva con mazorcas en condiciones de ser vendidas a los centros de acopio de su localidad. Como parte de un buen trato al medio ambiente suele usar solo abono orgánico para fertilizar sus tierras. Uno de sus principales inconvenientes es transportar los pesados sacos con los granos secos desde sus parcelas hasta la ciudad ya que las vías de acceso con algo angostas y esto le obliga a gastar más dinero. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida de recibir un apoyo financiero que le permite seguir adelante con su negocio. En esta ocasión desea contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico y fertilizar sus terrenos de cultivo.
texts.en: 28 year old Nancy is married to Walter and has 2 children who she lives with in her own house. Nancy works in agriculture because, since she was very young, she has always supported her parents who worked as farmers growing organic cocoa and barbasco (a plant that is used in traditional fishing). This is how she learned everything she needed to know to do this work in a way that would make it very economically beneficial. When she turned 20, her parents left her 4 blocks of land planted with cocoa and, together with her partner, she began working for her family's wellbeing. Her work in the fields brings her good income as, along with her partner and some contract workers, she constantly tends the cocoa trees so that at the end of the season the pods are in good condition to be sold at the collection centers in her area. For environmental reasons, she only uses organic fertilizers on her land. One of her greatest inconveniences is transporting the heavy sacks full of dried grains from their land to the city as the access routes are narrow and this means she has to spend more money. This is her first loan from Kiva and she feels grateful to receive the loan as it will enable her to press ahead with her business. On this occasion, she would like $375 to buy organic manure and fertilizer for her cultivated land.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.es:
Teofilo es un hombre de 51 años, está casado con Marina de 46 años con quien formó una familia muy sólida cuyos hijos ya son personas mayores e independientes. Vive junto  a su esposa en su casa propia construida a base de adobe. Teofilo se dedica integramente a la agricultura por este motivo siembra plantas de cacao y árboles frutales. Esta actividad lo desempeña hace más de 25 años y siempre ha contado con el apoyo de su esposa y sus hijos pero aveces contrata trabajadores del lugar para que agilizar las tareas pendientes. 
Suele usar  abono orgánico para la fertilización de sus terrenos y así obtener una buena cosecha porque es necesario mediante la venta de sus productos recuperar el dinero que invirtió esperando también ganar dinero adicional. Su principal inconveniente es el tema del trasporte de sus sacos con productos listos para ser vendidos porque las vías de acceso hasta sus parcelas son algo complicadas y los transportistas fijan precios elevados lo cual le genera un gasto importante. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
En está ocasión desea contar con 500 nuevo soles para la compra de herramientas y reemplazar las que ya tiene por estar desgastadas tales como machetes, tijeras de podar y otros necesarios para el trabajo en el campo.
texts.en:
Teofilo is a 51 year old man who is married to 46 year old Marina with whom he has formed a very stable family whose children are already grown-up and independent. He lives with his wife in their own house which is made of adobe. Teofilo works in agriculture and grows cocoa and fruit trees. He has been doing this work for more than 25 years and has always had the support of his wife and his children but sometimes also hires contract workers from the area  to expedite urgent tasks. 
He usually uses organic manure to fertilize his land and in this way he gets a good harvest as it is necessary that her recuperates the money that he invests in his farm when he sells his crops and he hopes also to make additional profits. His main inconvenience is transporting his sacks of crops that are ready to be sold as the access to his land is complicated so the transport people charge high prices which cause him a considerable expense. This is his first loan from Kiva and he feels grateful for the financial support that he is receiving to help him get ahead. He also promises to make his repayments punctually. 
On this occasion, he would like $200 to buy tools and replace those that have work out such as machetes, pruning shears, and others that are necessary to work the fields.

loans.use: to buy tools such as machetes, pruning shears, and others.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda tiene 34 años, está casada y vive junto a sus 3 hijos en la casa de madera que le heredarón sus padres. Anteriormente poseía una pequeña tienda de productos comestibles donde expendía productos de primera necesidad pero decidió cerrarlo ya que en su zona empezarón a aparecer negocios similares generándole competencia. Por eso actualmente se dedica a la venta de comida rápida en una de las calles mas concurridas de su localidad, en este puesto de venta muestra su talento y sazón para dichos alimentos. Lleva desempeñandosé 2 meses en este negocio negocio. Se siente muy segura de poder salir adelante junto a su esposo y espera con el tiempo seguir trabajando con la motivación que la caracteriza para cumplir uno de sus objetivos que es construir su vivienda a base de material noble para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante. En esta oportunidad desea solicitar 3,000 nuevos soles para hacer efectiva la compra de un carrito sanguchero el cual exclusivo para este tipo de negocio.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 34 years old, she is married, and she lives with her husband and their three children in a wooden house that she inherited from her parents. Previously, she owned a small convenience store, but she decided to close it because other similar stores began to open in the area.  Because of this, she now sells fast food on one of the busiest streets in the area and she makes delicious meals.  

She has been running this business now for 2 months.  She is certain that she will continue to be able to get by with the help of her husband.  She hopes that by continuing to work hard she will be able to reach one of her goals, which is to build a new home with good materials so that she can improve the quality of life for her family.  

This is her second loan from Kiva and she is very thankful for the financial support that she is receiving so that she can get by. With this loan of 3,000 soles, she will be able to buy a food cart that she will use in her business.

loans.use: to buy a cart for selling fast food.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: Lourdes, tiene 43 años de edad, esta casada, tiene dos hijas y vive en el municipio de la Lima, Cortes. Anteriormente trabajaba en una empresa privada en Roatán, pero hace 3 años empezó con el negocio de una pulpería donde tiene venta de productos alimenticios como ser carnes, embutidos, churros, queso, mantequilla, productos de aseo, refrescos, productos enlatados, pastillas, etc. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo para surtir la pulpería y es  por 10,000 lempiras, para comprar productos de limpieza para el hogar, carnes,refrescos, granos básicos y lácteos. Su meta es seguir con su negocio y que sus hijas sigan estudiando.
texts.en: 43 year old Lourdes is married and has 2 daughters and lives in the municipality of Lima, Cortes. Previously, she work in a private business in Roatán. But, 3 years ago, she started her own grocery store where she sells food stuffs such as meats, sausages, churros, cheese, butter, cleaning products, sodas, canned goods, etc. She has decided to request a loan to supply her grocery store and it is for $500 to buy cleaning products for the home, meats, sodas, staple grains, and dairy products. Her goals are to continue with her business and that her daughters will keep studying.

loans.use: to buy products such as meats, dairy goods, staple grains, hygiene prodcuts, etc, to sell.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en: This is 38-year-old Ibrahim. He is married and has 2 children ages 15 and 3. He has 1 additional dependent who lives with him for schooling. In 2007, Ibrahim established his business selling milk, mayonnaise, biscuits, drinks, sugar, etc. He began his business because he wants to help to develop his family. His business is located in the outskirts and his main customers are general community people. Working 7 days a week and 17 hours a day, he earns about Le800,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le5,000,000. Ibrahim requires a loan in order to buy more provisions and drinks for resale. He hopes that this loan wills support him through proper use. In the future, Ibrahim plans to open a bigger shop, educate his children and to build a house. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more provisions and drinks for resale.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es: Reina, tiene 42 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo y sus tres hijos con quienes ella vive en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de San Pedro Sula. Anteriormente se dedicaba a la compra y a la venta de cerdos. Tiene 2 años y 3 meses de prestar el servicio de  molino de moler el maíz para hacer las tortillas. Además ella elabora y vende tortillas. Esta solicitando un segundo préstamo, este es por  6,000 Lempiras para darle mantenimiento al molino y para comprar maíz para elaborar tortillas y vender. Su meta es crecer económicamente abriendo otros locales para establecer otro molino en diferentes puntos de la comunidad.
texts.en:
Reina is 42 years old and she lives with her husband and their three children in a neighborhood in San Pedro Sula.  Previously she worked buying and selling pigs. For the past 2 years and 3 months she has been grinding corn for use in making tortillas. She also makes and sells tortillas.

She is seeking her second loan, this one for 6,000 Lempiras, so that she can perform maintenance on her mill and so that she can buy corn for making and selling tortillas.  Her goal is to increase her income by opening other sales locations and by installing other corn mills in different parts of the community.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on her corn mill and to buy corn in order to make and sell tortillas.

loans.name: Keny Rosibel

texts.es: Keny, tiene 26 años de edad, esta casada, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de Morazán, Yoro. Ella anteriormente se dedicaba a la elaboración y a la venta de queso y mantequilla y ahora tiene 6 meses de tener una pulpería en la cual vende arroz, azúcar, manteca, golosinas, condimentos etc. El préstamo que ha solicitado es el tercer ciclo y este es por 8,000 Lempiras, con el cual va invertir en  la compra de productos como granos básicos, manteca, azúcar, huevos, productos de higiene, pan, churros refrescos etc. para surtir el negocio y satisfacer las necesidades de los clientes. Su plan es mantener siempre surtido de productos para aumentar los ingresos y darles apoyo a sus hijos en lo que necesiten.
texts.en: 26 year old Keny is married and has 2 children and lives in the municipality of Morazán, Yoro. She previously worked making and selling cheese and butter but has had a grocery store for 6 months where she sells rice, sugar, butter, candies, condiments, etc. She is requesting her third loan and it is for $400 which she will use to buy products such as staple grains, butter, sugar, eggs, hygiene products, bread, churros, sodas, etc, to supply her store and satisfy her customers' needs. Her plan is to keep the store well supplied to increase her profits and give her children what they need.

loans.use: to buy products such as sodas, sugar, flour, hygiene products, bread, churros, butter, staple grains, etc, to supply her business.

loans.name: Blanca Irene

texts.es: Blanca, tiene 41 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene 4 hijos  y vive en una aldea del municipio de Tela, Atlántida. Ella tiene 8 años de dedicarse a la venta de comidas como pescado frito con tajadas, comida típica, camarones y otros mariscos. El negocio lo tiene frente a su casa. Ella siempre se ha dedicado al comercio. Esta solicitando un segundo préstamo con ODEF que es por 7,000 Lempiras para abastecerse de productos como pescado, mariscos, refrescos y otros insumos para la venta de comida. Su objetivo es mejorar la atención e incrementar el negocio.
texts.en: 41 year old Blanca lives with her common-law husband with whom she has 4 children. She lives in a village of the municipality of Tela, Atlántida. She has been working for 8 years selling foods such as fried fish with plantain, local dishes, shrimp, and other seafood. She runs her business from the front of her house. She has always worked in business. She is requesting her second loan from ODEF for $350 to stock-up on products such as fish, seafood, sodas, and other supplies for selling food. Her goal is to increase attention and grow her business.

loans.use: Compra de insumos para la elaboracion de comidas como ser pescado, mariscos, refrescos y otros.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, iron bars, sand, concrete blocks and cyclone fencing.

loans.name: Alihaji

texts.en:
This is 34-year-old Alihaji. He is married, and has a one-year-old child. 

In 2006, Alihaji established his electrical materials business. He began his business because he wants to take care of his family. His business is located in the outskirts of Freetown and his main customers are general community people. Working seven days a week and 15 hours a day, he earns about SLL 500,000 every month from this business. 

He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 4,000,000. Alihaji requires a loan in order to buy more electrical materials for resale. He hopes that this loan will support him through proper use. In the future, Alihaji plans to educate his child unto university. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more electrical materials for resale.

loans.name: Iris Consuelo

texts.es: Iris, tiene 46 años de edad, esta casada, tiene cinco hijos y dos nietos, vive en el municipio de Arizona, Atlántida. Hace 12 años realiza la actividad de la elaboración y venta de productos lácteos como ser queso, mantequilla, cuajada y quesillo. El préstamo que solicito es por 12,000 Lempiras y ya es el tercer ciclo con ODEF,  el cual los va utilizar para la compra de leche, utensilios y cuajo para la elaboración de quesos y otros productos lácteos. Su meta es seguir manteniendo el negocio en pie para obtener los ingresos necesarios.
texts.en: Iris is 46 years old. She is married and has five children and two grandchildren. She lives in the town of Arizona, Atlántida. Twelve years ago she started the activity of making and selling dairy products such as cheese, butter, cheese curdles, and fresh cheese. The loan she has asked for is for 12,000 Lempiras and this is already her third cycle in ODEF. She is going to use it to buy milk, utensils and curdling agent to make cheese and other dairy products. Her goal is to keep her business going in order to obtain the necessary income.

loans.use: to buy milk, utensils, and curdling agent to make cheese and other dairy products.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is a 41-year-old married woman. She has 4 children ranging in age from 1 to 15. She describes herself as committed. She operates a farm where she keeps poultry and grows crops. She has been involved in this business for 3 years. Her business is located in a strategic place. She describes her biggest business challenge as changes in the weather . She will use the 80,000 KES loan to buy more poultry, animal feed and farm inputs like fertilizer and seeds. Her business goal is to own a large farm within 5 years. This her second loan with SMEP DTM. Her previous loan of 20,000 KES was repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and diversify her business.

loans.use: to buy more poultry, animal feed and farm inputs like fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Milka

texts.en: Milka is a 55-year-old married woman. She has 6 children. She describes herself as a go-getter. She operates a pig farm where she rears pigs to sell. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located in an area with market availability and her primary customers are hotels and institutions. She identifies pig diseases as being her biggest business challenge. She will use the 50,000 KES loan to buy more piglets. Her business goal is to start poultry farming within 5 years. She hopes that, in the future, she will be self-reliant. This her fifth loan with SMEP DTM. Her previous loan of 100,000 KES was repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children.

loans.use: To buy more piglets

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is a 36-year-old woman. She describes herself as an entrepreneur. She operates a retail shop where she sells clothes, shoes and household goods. She has been involved in this business for 9 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are retail buyers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be high inflation. She will use the 50,000 KES loan to add stock of clothes, shoes and household goods. Her business goal is to be a wholesaler of household goods within 5 years. She hopes that, in the future, she will improve her life through the business. This her third loan with SMEP DTM. Previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: To add stock of clothes, shoes and household goods

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en: Fredrick is a 30-year-old man. He describes himself as patient. He operates a motorcycle transport business where he transports customers using a motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for 3 years. His business is located in a vibrant area and his primary customers are of all types. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insecurity. He will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy motorcycle spare parts. His business goal is to own a garage and also to be a dealer of motorcycles within 5 years. He hopes that, in the future, he will build his own house. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM. He will use the anticipated profits to open a garage.

loans.use: To buy motorcycle spare parts

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more drinks of different kinds for resale.

loans.name: Mariatu

texts.en:
This is 38-year-old Mariatu. She is married and has three children, age 10, 8 and 5 years. 

In 2008, Mariatu established her provision business. She began her business because she wants to help her husband in some family responsibilities. Her business is located in the outskirts and her main customers are all classes of people. Working seven days a week and 18 hours a day, she earns about SLL 260,000 every month from this business. 

She would like a loan in the amount of SLL 3,000,000. Mariatu requires a loan in order to buy more provisions such as milk, sugar, etc., for resale. She hopes that this loan will support her through proper use. 

In the future, Mariatu plans to educate her children to university level. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more provisions such as milk, sugar, etc., for resale.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary began her start-up business, Price Exchange Clothes and Gift Shop, in New Orleans in early 2013 with more than five years of retail experience and the readiness to take on the role of business owner.

Within her store, Mary sells gently used clothing, jewelry, and new and gently used shoes for men and women, along with many other items. The consignment shop offers many of the latest trends at competitive prices.

Before she began her business, Mary’s friend referred her to Accion Texas Inc., the nation’s largest nonprofit microlender. She applied for a microloan to begin her business and buy inventory for the newly opened store. She also used the loan to hire one part-time employee to assist with the day-to-day operations. 

As Mary looks forward to working in her store and expanding in the future, she says that, without the loan, “I would not have been able to buy additional inventory.”

loans.use: to begin her business and buy inventory for the newly opened store.

loans.name: Felleze

texts.en:
With her previous loan, Felleze added a dairy cow with your financial help, and this time she would like to add another one. She is very appreciative to all Kiva lenders and wishes a happy summer to everyone!

This will be Felleze's fourth loan; she has proved to be responsible in the past.

loans.use: to purchase one more dairy cow.

loans.name: San Blas Group

texts.es:
Las 20 integrantes de este comité cuentan con diversas actividades, cada una de ellas invierten sus fuerzas y ganas en ir mejorando sus actividades e ir capacitándose y de esa forma dar a sus familias todo lo que necesitan.
Nilsa es una de las integrantes de este grupo, ella es la presidenta y comenta que se dedica a un salón de belleza, tiene un buen negocio con el cual ayuda a su familia y tiene os ingresos para salir adelante. Ella sueña con ir ampliando su local y de esa forma ayudar a su familia.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en comprar tintes, peines, shampoo, enjuagues y demás insumos y de esa forma seguir dando una buena atención a sus clientes. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe.
texts.en:
The 20 members of this communal bank are involved in different activities.  They all work hard to improve their businesses and receive training so they can give their families everything they need.

Nilsa is one of the members of the group and she is also the president.  She has a beauty salon which is a good business.  With her income she has enough to get ahead and help her family.  Her goal is to expand her shop so she can help her family even more.

She is requesting a loan to buy hair color, shampoo, conditioners and other supplies so she can continue providing good customer service.  She is grateful for this opportunity.

loans.use: To buy hair color, combs, shampoo, conditioners and other supplies.

loans.name: Fortaleza Group

texts.es:
Fortaleza está en su quinto ciclo, están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza donde dos de las integrantes están en el nivel uno, quienes se encuentran esforzándose el doble por ir mejorando.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Artemia, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno. Ella vende comidas, es muy hábil con lo que hace, y con ello está tratando de ir mejorando su vida y la de su familia. Artemia es una persona muy luchadora y trabajadora, que tiene muchas metas y objetivos por lo que quiere luchar.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de verduras, condimentos, carne, pollo y demás, ya que son sus principales insumos para hacer sus comidas.
texts.en:
Fortaleza is in its fifth cycle. It is doing the poverty elimination survey and two of the members are at level one, and are doing twice the effort to improve.  

One of them members is Artemia. In the survey she was shown to be at a level one of poverty. She sells food. She is very good at what she does and she is trying to improve her and her family's quality of life. Artemia is a very hardworking person who is a fighter. She has a lot of goals and objectives that she wants to fight for. 

She is asking for this loan to be able to invest it on buying vegetables, condiments, beef, chicken and more. These are her main ingredients for her food. .

loans.use: to buy vegetables, condiments, beef, chicken and more.

loans.name: Rosa Mistica Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Rosa Mistica está en su ciclo número 4  del programa de comité, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. El grupo es muy unido y estable.
Leonida es la tesorera del grupo y se dedica a la venta de cosméticos. Es una persona muy trabajadora que siempre inspira a sus compañeras a seguir luchando y trabajando por sus metas y sueños.
La Sra. Leonida solicita de este crédito para la compra de perfumes, talcos, desodorantes y maquillajes, lo que le ayudará a  concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called "Rosa Mistica" ["Mystic Rose"] is in its fourth loan cycle in the communal bank program. All of the members are working and helping each other to get ahead. The group is very stable and unified. 

Leonida is the group's treasurer, and she works selling cosmetics. She is a very hard-working person who always inspires her fellow members to keep working and fighting for their goals and dreams. 

Leonida is requesting this loan to buy perfumes, powders, deodorants and makeup, which will help her carry out her business plan. This will help her increase her income.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, powders, deodorants and makeup.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El comité mujeres unidas se formo en la ciudad de Concepción, en una de sus colonias, una zona alejada de la zona céntrica. Se puede decir que es un lugar bastante rural y que aun esta en crecimiento. Todas las integrantes de este grupo son mujeres capaces que también quieren poder ayudar a su comunidad.
Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la Sra. Mercedes, ella también es la presidenta de este grupo, es una mujer muy dinámica y trabajadora, tiene un salón de belleza, también vende producto de limpiezas y vende cargas para celulares. Es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que cada día mira para adelante con ganas de ir creciendo.
Solicita de este crédito para poder surtir su salón de belleza con shampoo, enjuagues, tintes, esmaltes y demás insumos que le permitirá seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes. Ella quiere también que su comunidad vaya creciendo y pueda ofrecer una mayor seguridad a las familias.
texts.en:
The committee named “Mujeres Unidas” (United Women) was established in one of the neighborhoods in the city of Concepción. This neighborhood is located some distance away from the downtown area. In other words, it is in a rural area, but it is experiencing growth. All of the members of this group are capable women who want to help their community.

One of the members is Sra. Mercedes, who also serves as the president of the group. She is a dynamic and hardworking woman who manages a beauty salon. Mercedes also sells cleaning products and reloadable cards for mobile phones. She is a hardworking and determined individual who strives each day to get ahead because of her desire to grow.

Mercedes is requesting a loan so that she can restock her beauty salon with shampoo, rinses, dyes, nail polishes, and other supplies in order to continue providing good service to her customers. She also wants to see her community continue its growth and provide greater security for families.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, rinses, dyes, nail polishes, and other supplies.

loans.name: Yuli

texts.es: Yuli es una joven de 20 años que vive junto a su esposo Cristian y su pequeña Ariana en su casa de madera. Yuli se dedica a la agricultura por eso cultiva algunos productos de la zona rentables como cacao orgánico y barbasco. Desde niña creció junto a sus padres quienes realizaban la misma actividad motivándola a seguir con el negocio familiar de manera independiente. Al comprometerse con Cristian encontró en el un gran compañero de trabajo con quien sale al campo todas las mañanas para realizar las distintas tareas esperando obtener frutos de calidad al final la campaña productiva para lograr vender los granos secos a buen precio en la ciudad a los compradores mayoristas. El cacao orgánico es un producto muy rentable en su localidad pero a su vez requiere también mano de obra constante para darle un buen cuidado y mantenimiento por eso aveces contrata a trabajadores del lugar para el retiro de maleza entre sus plantaciones y así evitar que estas consuman los nutrientes de sus terrenos agrícolas. Su principal objetivo es iniciar la construcción su vivienda con material noble. Este su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En está ocasión desea solicitar 3,000 nuevos soles para comprar abono orgánico y plantaciones nuevas de cacao.
texts.en: Yuli is 20 years old and lives with her husband Cristian and her little daughter Ariana in their wooden house. Yuli works in agriculture. She grows products that are profitable in the area. such as organic cacao and barbasco. Since she was a child she grew up with her parents who did the same activity, motivating her to continue in the family business on her own. When she got engaged to Cristian, she found in him a great work companion who goes out to the fields every morning to do the different tasks, hoping to obtain quality products at the end of the productive season so that they can sell their dry grains at a good price to the wholesalers in the city. Organic cacao is a very profitable product in her community but it also requires constant labor for care and maintenance. That is why sometimes she hires workers from the are to take out the weeds among the plants and thus keep these from consuming the nutrients from her cropland. Her main objective id to build a brick house. This is her second Kiva loan and she is grateful for the financial support that she is getting to continue ahead. She is also committed to making her payments on time. At this time, she wants to ask for 3,000 nuevos soles to buy organic fertilizer and new cacao plants.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and cacao plants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cement, iron, bricks, sand and gravel.

loans.name: Ngu

texts.en:
Ngu is 42 years old. She has four sons. The oldest one is making carpentry. The others are learning at the 5th grade, the 4th grade, and at kindergarten. Ngu's husband works as a carpenter to earn a living. His income is 7,000,000 VND per month. Ngu grows rice. She earns from her job 3,000,000 VND a month. She has done this job for 20 years. Her family’s total earnings are about 10,000,000 VND per month. Besides that, Ngu also does carpentry to earn more money. 

Ngu's challenge in life and work is the lack of money to pay for her children’s education. Her dream is having a full life where her children can grow up well, be successful in life. This loan is one of the steps that helps her get to this dream. She can buy more wood to do carpentry and to earn income and save the profit for her children’s education. 

Ngu is a hardworking woman.She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2009. In the last loan cycle, she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid on time. In this loan cycle, she would again like to borrow 9,632,000 VND to buy more wood to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more wood to expand her business.

loans.name: Lan's Group

texts.en:
Lan was born in 1969. She has two children, one of whom is married. The other one is a worker and earns about 4,000,000 VND per month. Lan and her husband sell blankets and cushions to earn a living. Her husband earns about 5,000,000 VND and Lan earns about 3,000,000 VND per month. They have done this job for a long time. Her family’s total earnings are about 12,000,000 VND per month.

Lan's challenges in life and work are the lack of capital to invest in her business and the low consumption of customers. Her dream is to have full capital to sell, so she doesn’t need to borrow from anyone else . This loan is one of the steps to helping her reach to this dream.

Lan is a hardworking and passionate businesswoman. She has participated in SEDA's microfinance program since 2012. In the last loan cycle, she borrowed 5,014,000 VND and repaid it on time. In this new loan cycle, she would like to borrow 6,758,000 VND to buy more blankets and cushions for her shop. She always wants to expand her business scale.

Other members who are part of Lan's group include the following:
Hoa is 31 years old. She has two children. She sells wood products. She wants to borrow 6,758,000 VND to invest in her business. 
Thuy is 29 years old. She has three children. She is a barber. She wants to borrow 6,758,000 VND to invest in her barber shop. 
Nhien is 44 years old. She has four children. She cooks food to sell. She wants to borrow 6,758,000 VND to invest in her business. 
Trang is 26 years old. She has a child. She cooks food to sell. She wants to borrow 6,758,000 VND to invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy more blankets and cushions for her shop.

loans.name: Moureen

texts.en: Moureen is a Kiva borrower. She has 3 children with ages ranging from 3 to 5 years. She describes herself as patient. She operates a boutique where she sells clothes and bags. She has been involved in this business for 4 years. Her business is located in a vibrant area and her primary customers are females. She describes her biggest business challenge as being lack of capital. She will use the 20,000 KES loan to add stock of handbags and trousers. Her business goal is to own a salon within 5 years. She hopes that, in the future, she will educate her children. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM. She will use the anticipated profits to build a house.

loans.use: To add stock of handbags and trousers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a tractor to obtain larger jobs and  improve his earnings.

loans.name: Kleopatra

texts.en:
Kleopatra is a 25-year-old seamstress who offers her services only to females in her city. She now wants to stock up on raw fabric material. Four years ago she started her clothing repair & alterations shop and, according to her, she has been generating a good income throughout the years.

“I went to university and finished my studies with good grades, but I gave it all up because my passion then was for what I do now. I totally love it. I learned the skills on my own. While still a student, I worked in this field from home to pay off my tuition fees and help myself and my family. I love talking to people and serving them; I also happen to love very much the end result of my work and the smiles on people’s faces after they have received my services,” Kleopatra said.

loans.use: to buy raw fabric material for her females' clothing repair & alterations shop

loans.name: Santa Rosalia Group

texts.es:
Santa Rosalia es un grupo formado en la ciudad de Caacupé, tiene 13 integrantes, donde cada una de ellas está poniendo todo de sí para ir mejorando su vida y ayudar a sus familias.
La señora Gladis es la tesorera del comité, ella invierte su crédito en compra de arcillas y leñas para la elaboración de ladrillos, ya que a eso ella se dedica. Es una persona que está luchando por su familia, ya que quiere darles todo lo que ella no pudo tener.
Esta muy agradecida por esta oportunidad que recibe y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The Santa Rosalía Group in the city of Caacupé has 13 members who all do their best to improve their life situation and help their families.

Gladis is the treasurer of the group.  She plans to use the loan to buy clay and firewood to make bricks since that is what she does for a living. She is a very dedicated person who struggles for her family because she wants to give them the things she was unable to have.

She is very grateful for this opportunity which will be of much help to her.

loans.use: To buy clay and firewood.

loans.name: Thoa's Group

texts.en:
Thoa was born in 1979. She has two children who are in the 10th and 6th grade of school. Her husband is a driver to earn a living. He earns about 7,000,000 VND per month. Thoa grows rice and she earns about 3,000,000 VND per month. She has done this job for a long time. Besides that, she also sews to earn more money. Her family’s total earnings are about 10,000,000 VND per month.

Thoa's challenge in life and work is lack of capital to invest in her business. Her dream is having enough capital to expand her business, so she doesn't need to borrow from anyone else. This loan is one of steps to helping her reach this dream. She can invest in her business to gain earnings and save her profits. Thoa is a hardworking woman and a passionate businesswoman.

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2010. In the last loan cycle, she borrowed 8,066,000 VND and repaid on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 9,810,000 VND to buy materials and sewing machines to expand her sewing business.

Other members who are part of Thoa's group include the following:
Huong is 37 years old. She has two children. She sells motorbikes. She wants to borrow 9,810,000 VND to invest in her business. 
Dung is 38 years old. He has three children. He sells groceries. He wants to borrow 9,810,000 VND to invest in his grocery store. 
Mai is 24 years old. She has a child. She sells clothes. She wants to borrow 6,758,000 VND to invest in her business. 
Tien is 45 years old. He has two children. He cooks food to sell. He wants to borrow 6,758,000 VND to invest in his business.

loans.use: to buy materials and sewing machines to expand her sewing business.

loans.name: Kuña Rory Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Rory está en su ciclo número 5º  del programa de comité de mujeres, ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 6  se encuentran en el nivel rojo, es decir con ingresos bajos, pero con ganas de ir mejorando.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Carmen, quien en su última encuesta mostro un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos, es decir con ingresos medios, pero ella a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que hace la venta de comestibles y la cría de pollitos de forma independiente, también se debe destacar el ánimo de superarse que tiene y la lucha que hace.
La Sra. Carmen solicita de este crédito para la inversión en comida para sus pollitos y también insumos para seguir haciendo sus comestibles.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Kuña Rory" is in its fifth loan cycle through the women's program.  They are taking the poverty elimination survey which shows that six of them are at the red level, meaning low income, with a desire to do better.

One of the members is Carmen who on the last survey was shown to be at level two, with a medium level income.  Through much effort and hard work she is improving her situation.  The work she does involves selling food and raising chickens, independently.  Her desire to get ahead and work hard is commendable.

Carmen is requesting a loan to buy chicken feed and ingredients to make food.

loans.use: To buy chicken feed and supplies to make food.

loans.name: Lan

texts.en:
Lan is 42 years old. She has two children. One of them has just graduated at college. The other one is learning at the 11th grade. Her husband is a hired laborer. His income is 5,000,000 VND.
